page.title: 13SPORTS DAY
page.content: EVERY YEAR A SCHOOL SPORTS DAY TAKES PLACE TO TRY AND WIN A TROPHY.ALL FOUR TEAMS;SWALW,WHARFE,URE AND NIDD TAKE PART AGAINST EACH OTHER TO WIN POINTS. THE TEAM WHO GETS THE MOST POINTS WINS THE CUP. ON THE MORNING OF SPORTS DAY I HELPED TO PUT OUT THE EQUIPMENT.THEN PARENTS CAME FLOODING IN TO WATCH THE RACES. WE ALL SAT DOWN AND THE RACES BEGAN. I HELPED TO GIVE OUT THE BADGES TO THE WINNERS. THE OBSTACLE RACE WAS THE BEST TO WATCH.CHILDREN HAD TO DRESS UP,CRAWL UNDER A NET,RUN ALONG A BENCH,JUMP A HURDLE AND THEN CROSS THE FINISH. WHEN ALL THE POINTS WERE ADDED UP URE TEAM HAD WON AND SO THE TWO CAPTAINS CAME UP TO RECEIVE THE TROPHY.
